text:
you should probably call this using PATCH and put the properties into the request body:

/crm/v3/objects/deals/{dealId}

here's what I found regarding your question, it seems the post was made 2 weeks ago:

<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/quot-File-Usage-quot-access-via-API-endpoints/td-p/986090?profile.language=en>
